import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Staff_Stats_cards from "./DashboardComponents/Staff_Stats_cards"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "./index.css"; import { dashboardActions } from "../../../../Actions"; import TableDropdownDrug from './Dropdown/TableDropdownDrug'; const AdminDrugs = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); let stats: any = []; stats = useSelector((state: any) => state.dashboardStats?.drugslist); useEffect(() => { const loadDashboardStats = async () => { await dispatch(dashboardActions.getAllDrugs()); }; loadDashboardStats(); }, [dispatch]); console.log(stats); return ( <>
{/* */}
